content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your electrical needs today? May I have your name to get started?
Hi, my name is Eileen. I was looking for help with an electrical outlet that isn’t working.
Thank you, Eileen! Could you please provide the address where the service is needed?
Thank you! Let me check if your location is within our service area.
Great news, we can provide service at your address! When would be a convenient time for our technician to come out and take a look at your electrical outlet?
Actually, I just saw online that another company can do it for less. Sorry, I’ll have to go with them.
Thank you for letting us know, Eileen. If you need us in the future or have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out. We appreciate your consideration.
